original_text: I saw that heaven was now open. I saw a white horse there! The name of the man who was riding the horse was this: ‘A faithful, honest person’. He is always right when he judges people and when he goes to punish them in war. I saw that heaven was now open. I saw a white horse there! The name of the man who was riding the horse was this: ‘A faithful, honest person’. He is always right when he judges people and when he goes to punish them in war.
korean_text: 또 내가 하늘이 열린 것을 보니 보라 백마와 그것을 탄 자가 있으니 그 이름은 충신과 진실이라 그가 공의로 심판하며 싸우더라

sentences.original_text: I saw that heaven was now open
I saw a white horse there
The name of the man who was riding the horse was this
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말을 탄 사람의 이름은 이것이었다

sentences.original_text: He is always right when he judges people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들을 심판할 때 항상 옳다

sentences.original_text: and when he goes to punish them in war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 전쟁에서 그들을 벌할 때도 옳다
